content.html: I interviewed for GitHub last year. I went in with my eyes open about their contracts with ICE. I didn’t get the job, but I got through to the last round. I did so because A) I got laid off right at the start of the pandemic and B) I was uniquely qualified for the role
content.value:
I interviewed for GitHub last year. I went in with my eyes open about their contracts with ICE. I didn’t get the job, but I got through to the last round.

I did so because

A) I got laid off right at the start of the pandemic

and

B) I was uniquely qualified for the role
